name: Amunets Weather Changes - v2.0.10
description:
Mod-ID: 1719601104

Change weather thresholds. Defaults to 'less rain'.

Temperate (North):
- Clear below 75 (was 50)
- Rain from 75 to 90 (was 50 to 80)
- Thunderstorm above 90 (was 80)

Swamp:
- Clear below 60 (was 30)
- Rain 60-90 (was 30 to 80)
- Thunderstorm above 90

Console commands:
- Everybody: 'DataCmd WeatherCheck' to check current weather settings
- Admin: 'DataCmd WeatherConfig <TempRain> <TempStorm> <ColdSnow> <SwampRain> <SwampStorm>' to set weather thresholds.

Examples: 
'DataCmd WeatherConfig 50 80 30 30 80' for "conan default".
'DataCmd WeatherConfig 75 90 30 60 90' for "less rain".
'DataCmd WeatherConfig 101 101 30 101 101' for "no rain"

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/sailorsat

For MS-Store users - read [url=https://forums.funcom.com/t/for-ms-store-how-to-get-mods-off-the-steam-workshop-without-a-steam-account/174325]this[/url].
changeNote:
